landing.title: Thola Iqembu Lakho Lezepolitiki
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo mayelana nemibono yakho yezepolitiki uthole ukuthi yiliphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nezindinganiso zakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwa endaweni futhi azikaze zabiwe.

about.title: Mayelana ne-isiVote
about.methodologyText: I-isiVote isebenzisa uhlelo lwamaphuzu ukufanisa imibono yakho yezepolitiki namaqembu aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho kubalulekile. Asiqoqi noma data ya motho noma izimpendulo zemibuzo. Kuphela i-language preference yakho igcinwe endaweni kodivaysi yakho. Izimpendulo zemibuzo zakho ziseningwa ngqo ku-URL lapho ushayela imiphumela - akukho ukugcinwa kusevela, akukho i-database, akukho ukulandelela. Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics, entle-hlonipha ubumfihlo engasebenzusi amakhukhi, engalandeli abantu, noma engaqoqi imininingwane ya motho. Imiphumela yakho iyakho ukuyabelana noma ukuyigcina kuqondile ngokupheleleyo ekuseni kwakho.
about.partiesText: Sihlanganisa amaqembu amakhulu ayisi-11 aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika.
about.disclaimerText: Leli thuluzi lingezelwazi kuphela futhi aliwona iseluleko sokuvota.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress iyiqembu elibusayo eNingizimu Afrika.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance ikhuthaza intando yeningi yenkululeko.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile ekuguquleni kwezomnotho ngokuqinile.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters iyiqembu elikwesokunxele kakhulu.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza amasiko amaZulu.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele izintshisekelo zama-Afrikaner.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA iyiqembu elisemaphakathi eligxile ekubuseni okungokoqobo.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza izindinganiso zobuKristu.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekuhlanganiseni abantu.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party imele ubuntu.

q1.text: Inkosilizali kufanele ibe mahala futhi ibikezelwe yuhulumeni kubo bonke.

q2.text: Imfundo ephakamileyo (ikiloji namanyunivesithi) kufanele ibe mahala kubo bonke abafundi.

q3.text: Isifunda sikhuluma imibuzo yesinghalo semvume yemali eyayisisekelo kubo bonke abantu, ngisho noma kukhombe amatreyiksi aphakeme noma amaleveni.

q4.text: Uhulumeni kufanele akhuphele amatreyikski kubo bantu abamcebo ukufunda izinhlelo zamahlongonhlobo.

q5.text: Uhulumeni kufanele ainvesthe kakhulu ezindlwini ezikhethekile zabantu abanezindinganiso eziphansi, ngisho noma kukhombe ukuthi izinye izinsiza ziyeshiywa.

q6.text: Ukuthuthuka komhlaba wasetingweni nezisebenzi zezolimo kufanele zithole imbuzo enkulu yehulumeni kanye nokuinvesta.

q7.text: Abasebenzi kufanele babe namathuba amakhulu okushayela kanye nokunegotiyeta ngokuqondile nabafundishi futhi ngaphandle kokungenelela kuhulumeni.

q8.text: Ukuqinisekiswa Kwezomnotho Kabantu Abamnyama (BEE) kanye nempilo eyibhalisisa kufanele ibe izinto ezibalulekile zokuthola kahulumeni.

q9.text: Ukuthatha umhlaba womuntu ngaphandle kokukhokha ngubani ugwebe ulunga ekusitsheni umhlaba.

q10.text: Umthetho-sisekelo kufanele uguqulwe ukuvumela uguquko olukhulu futhi anikezele uhulumeni amandla okulingana ngokwethunzi lwabantu.

q11.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibe sesixhasi se-imibango yokuthandwa isikhali kuzo zonke izinhlelo, ngisho noma kukhombe izintengo zabaningi.

q12.text: Umhlaba kufanele akusite amandla akabusha (ilanga, umoya) endlela enqumayo ekuphumele amakola.

q13.text: Ukungenelela okuningiziwe ekushayeni (ngisho noma kukhombe abaholi bakamuva) kubaluleke kunokushaya komuntu.

q14.text: Ukunciphisa ubugebengu, uhulumeni kufanele agxile ekushayeni izahluko ezinkulu kunokulunga okunzima senzakala.

q15.text: Izilwane ezingena kwanggeshini kufanele zisulwe futhi iphasi lemikhawulo lishone ekulungeni umuntu nomuntu woMzansi Afrika kanye nezinsiza zazo.
